name: py-pybtex
description: Pybtex is a BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-latexcodec
dependencies.description: A lexer and codec to work with LaTeX code in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-counter
dependencies.description:
Counter package defines the "counter.Counter" class similar to bags or
multisets in other languages.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex
dependent_to.description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.
